entities.description: The resident status of the arrestee which includes both residents and nonresidents.
The disposition of arrestees under 18, which includes whether they were referred or handled.
The unique identifier for the survey variable.
An indicator for data that is missing or unknown.
The number of occurrences of each response category.

relationships.description: Denotes whether the arrestee is a resident or nonresident.
Indicates the disposition of arrestee under 18, whether referred or handled.
Links a survey variable to its unique identifier.
Indicates that a survey variable has missing or unknown data.
Denotes the number of occurrences of each response category.
